root.name: The Amazing Spider-Man and Captain America in Doctor Doom's Revenge!
root.description: OverviewWhen Latverian president Dr. Doom plots to blow up New York by using an atomic bomb with the help of various Marvel villains, it becomes apparent that one Marvel superhero is not enough. Hence why Spider-Man and Captain America decide to team up and take on Dr. Doom and his henchmen. The game is a side-scrolling beat 'em up, in which you alternate in control with the two characters. They each have their own moves to deal with and plenty of bosses like The Rhino, and Electro to deal with. Fun FactsThis game came prepackaged with an actual comic book explaining the back story to this game.One of the villians you will face, Rattan, was specifically desinged for this game, the rest are pre-existing characters in the Marvel universe.
